name: Bumaga
description:
This is a 3rd person platform game with a world made of paper. The mechanics here are simple, you can run, jump and create platforms in the indicated places, bypass any obstacles. According to the plot of the game, you need to collect 3 items: The first is a "Banka s nebom i oblakami"(jar with sky and clouds). The second "Pesok s dna pustyni"(Sand from the bottom of the desert) The third most important thing is the "Kub s abstraktnymi ponyatiyami" (cube of abstract concepts). Each item is located in different locations, the design looks like a match for them. With their help, you must defeat the main enemy. The game will tell about him and his actions in the form of destruction of everything in its path, including the house and the local nature of the protagonist. I think everyone in the course of the game will understand how everything is connected.
The page will still be updated, I will write more about the game and add more screenshots with game moments.
Add the game to your wishlist.
